channel.title: Can someone give me a step by step?
channel.description: Can someone give me a step by step on how to setup a server so I can play on local host from the time I download the source to the time I get all of it configured?

item.title: Can someone give me a step by step?
item.dc:creator: @Old_Rsc_Player Old Rsc Player
item.description:
@Old_Rsc_Player wrote:

Post in right section
Download easyrs
Edit run/compile bat files to your JDK.
Compile Server
Run server
Run client.

Read full topic
item.source: Can someone give me a step by step?
